attributes.action: help stop culling of seals, whales and dolphins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Scotland, Canada and Japan and other countries around the globe, whales are being harpooned illegally and just left on shores to decompose.
Dophins urged to come up onto shores and only one is picked to go into captivity and the others are slaughtered,and dolphins are also killed with drift nets, a net put between two boats that catches and kills anything in its path.
Baby seals are culled in their thousands in Canada because they are 'overpopulated'.
Do u think this is fair when they've been on this earth longer than us?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
